trans-unit.source: Defines constants that specify whether single or multiple item selections are supported by a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Definisce le costanti che specificano se una o più selezioni di elemento supportate da un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> properties together determine how users can select items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>E <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>determinano insieme come gli utenti possono selezionare elementi in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A> is Single and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit>, the user can select one cell at a time in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>è singolo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>è <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit>, l'utente può selezionare una cella in un momento in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionUnit> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: InExtended mode, select multiple items by holding down the SHIFT key to extend the selection from an anchor point or the CTRL key to individually select additional items.
trans-unit.target: Modalità inExtended, selezionare più elementi tenendo premuto il tasto MAIUSC per estendere la selezione da un punto di ancoraggio o i tasti CTRL tasto singolarmente per selezionare elementi aggiuntivi.

trans-unit.source: Multiple items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> can be selected at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Più elementi all'interno di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref> può essere selezionato nello stesso momento.

trans-unit.source: Only one item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> can be selected at a time.
trans-unit.target: Solo un elemento nel <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref> possono essere selezionati contemporaneamente.
